com.pearson.pdn.learningstudio.exams

Class ExamService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pearson.pdn.learningstudio.core.AbstractService
      • com.pearson.pdn.learningstudio.exams.ExamService

  • public class ExamService
extends AbstractService
    Service for interacting with the exams module of LearningStudio

      Updates a user's answer for a question on a specific attempt of an exam in a course with GET /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId}/answers/{answerId} POST /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId}/answers PUT /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId}/answers/{answerId} using OAuth2 as a student

      Updates a user's attempt of an exam in a course to complete with PUT /users/{userId}/courses/{examId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId} using OAuth2 as student
      Response createExamAttempt(String userId, String courseId, String examId)
      Create an exam attempt for a user in a course with POST /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts using OAuth1 or OAuth2 as student, teacher, teaching assistant or administrator

      • answerQuestion

        public Response answerQuestion(String userId,
                      String courseId,
                      String examId,
                      String attemptId,
                      String questionId,
                      String answer)
                        throws IOException
        Updates a user's answer for a question on a specific attempt of an exam in a course with GET /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId}/answers/{answerId} POST /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId}/answers PUT /users/{userId}/courses/{courseId}/exams/{examId}/attempts/{attemptId}/answers/{answerId} using OAuth2 as a student
        Parameters:
        userId - ID of the user
        courseId - ID of the course
        examId - ID of the exam
        attemptId - ID of the attempt on the exam
        questionId - ID of the question on the exam
        answer - Answer to the question on the exam
        Returns:
        Response object with details of status and content
        Throws:
        IOException
